description:
In nova/compute/instance_types.py there's a check to see if the requested flavor_id supports any of the existing flavor_ids and if not return a default flavor type. This comparison works for json requests but does not work for xml requests as the xml flavor_id attribute has to be quoted and hence is considered a string, which always returns the default flavor instead of the requested one.

Simple fix is just to wrap the incoming flavor_id in a int.
title: Incompatible comparison on flavor_id when using the Openstack API with XML request body
